name: Accelerated Unity
effect: Deal 5 damage for each Tribe you control beyond the first.

name: Acid Wash
effect: Challenge Wisdom 15: Deal 10 damage.
Water: Uninfect all engaged Creatures. Those Creatures cannot be Infected.

name: Aggroar
effect: Strategists you control have "Defender."
Flickers like a frozen flame, strikes like a burning shard.

name: Arkanin
effect: 1MC: Deal 5 damage to target Creature.
1MC: Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
Arkanin can spend Mugic counters from other Muges you control to activate its abilities.
Some Muges avoid fighting, but Arkanin jumps into the heat of battle.

name: Balaan
effect: Sacrifice Balaan: Activate Hive.
When Balaan is placed in your discard pile, Infect target Uninfected Creature.
As his enemy sprouted antennae, Balaan knew his queen would be proud.

name: Bierk
effect: At the beginning of each turn, if your opponent controls an UnderWorld Creature, Activate Hive.
Hive: Fireproof 10 (When this Creature becomes engaged with a Creature with Fire, if Hive is active, it gains 10 Energy.)
Bierk was once seen cannonballing into the Lava Pond.

name: Carnival of Confusion
effect: When Carnival of Confusion becomes the active Location, Creatures lose all Elemental Types. If a Creature lost Fire this way, it gains Water. If a Creature lost Water, it gains Air. If a Creature lost Air, it gain Earth. If a Creature lost Earth, it gains Fire.
Elemental attacks deal an additional 5 damage.

name: Cascading Rondo
effect: Swap your Attack Discard pile with your Attack Deck, the shuffle your Attack Deck.
Though he appeared exhausted, he was merely getting his second wind.

name: Casters' Warsong
effect: Deal 5 damage to target Creature.
If the caster of this Mugic is a Muge, deal an additional 10 damage.
A sword can pierce the body, but a song can pierce the soul.

name: Chorus of Cothica
effect: Target Creature may play Mugic of any tribe.
Some speak of the one true song, the Mugic that unites all Perim.

name: Composition of Concentration
effect: Target Creature gains 30 in the discipline of your choice.
Mugic can raise the spirit to immeasurable heights.

name: Daj Huun
effect: Swift 2
Hive: Daj Huun cannot move and has an additional 10 Energy. (Hive must be activated.)
"Look up

name: Danian Carapace
effect: When equipped Creature deals damage to an Uninfected Creature, Infect that Creature.
If equipped Creature is destroyed while engaged, destroy any Battlegear equipped to opposing engaged Creature and equip Danian Carapace to opposing engaged Creature.

name: Danian Element Choral
effect: Target Creature gains all Elemental Types your Creatures have.
Harmonies can never be sung alone.

name: Danihilation
effect: If the opposing engaged Creature is Danian, deal 10 damage.

name: Dasalin
effect: Water 5
Hive: Dasalin does not have "Water 5" and has "1MC: Heal 10 damage to target Mandiblor" instead.
Quench your spirit as well as your thirst.

name: Defender's Song
effect: Creatures you control gain "Defender".
What inspires us to sacrifice ourselves for the ones that we love?

name: Desiccate the Land
effect: Earth: If an Attack Card named Desiccate the Land is in your Attack Discard pile, heal 10 damage.

name: Dibanni
effect: 1MC: Target adjacent Creature gains a Mugic counter.
Unique
"I can only open the door to understanding the true mysteries of Mugic. I can force no one to walk through it."

name: Dissonance of Distraction
effect: Target Creature loses 30 in the discipline of your choice.
Mugic can sink the spirit to immeasurable depths.

name: Dubin
effect: 1MC: Infect target Uninfected Creature.
While an opponent controls an Infected Creature, Dubin has an additional 5 Energy.
How does the parasite take control? Who knows... who cares?!

name: Elemental Denial
effect: Target Creature loses X Elemental Types of your choice.
Some believe the Cothica and nature are irrevocably linked... understand one and rule the other!

name: Elemental Elegy
effect: Target Creature loses an Elemental Type of your choice. If that Creature has no Elemental Types, it cannot move instead.

name: Elementalist Pauldrons
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy and 15 Power.
If equipped Creature is an Elementalist, it has all Elemental Types your Creatures have.

name: Elementalist's Psy-Blast
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 50: Deal 5 damage for each Elemental Type your engaged Creature has.

name: Faash
effect: Deactivate Hive: Faash gains "Fire 5." Hive cannot be Activated again this turn. (Hive must be active to Deactivate it.)

name: Forgotten Origins
effect: Target player removes all cards in his or her general discard pile from the game.
It was the most beautiful song I've ever heard... but now I can't even remember a single note.

name: Freeze Flash
effect: Water: Opposing engaged Creature loses 25 Speed.

name: Garv
effect: 1MC: Flip target Battlegear face-up or face-down.
Unique
Speaker of a thousand languages - from bird to bacteria - the bulbous monk wanders the land and watches life flourish with every step.

name: Gear Glissando
effect: Flip target Battlegear face-up or face-down.
Most Muges believe that the problem with machines is that they exist at all.

name: Gear Grind
effect: Flip all face-up Battlegear face-down.

name: Geltod
effect: Discard an UnderWorld Mugic Card: Deal 5 damage to target Creature.
"Ah-choo! Oh, gross! I just 'geltodded' into my hands."

name: Grand Hall of Muge's Summit
effect: When a Mugic counter is removed from a Creature, Grand Hall of Muge's Summit deals 10 damage to the engaged Creature controlled by the same player.
Muges rarely feel comfortable sharing their secrets.

name: Granite Balls
effect: If your engaged Creature is a Warrior, deal 10 damage unless the opposing engaged Creature pays a Mugic counter.

name: Hammerdoom Chantcaller
effect: Attacks played by Hammerdoom Chantcaller deal an additional 5 damage to Danian Creatures. If Hive is active, attacks played by Hammerdoom Chantcaller deal an additional 5 damage to Underworld Creatures instead.
Unique

name: Hive Destruction
effect: Deactivate Hive.
How absurd! The Danians act courageous, but they're merely thespians pretending to be warriors! We will rend their dirty hides into chaos!

name: Hive Unsung
effect: Deactivate Hive.
When you play Hive Unsung, you may pay a Mugic counter. If you do, return Hive Unsung to your hand when it resolves.
Some songs leave the audience in silence.

name: Hive-phoon
effect: If your engaged Creature is Danian, it gains Earth.

name: Hune Marquard
effect: When an opposing Creature plays a Danian Mugic, Hune Marquard gains a Mugic counter.
As the foremost authority on Danian Mugic, he works to unlock their mysteries... and how to exploit them.

name: Ice Cloak
effect: When Ice Cloak is flipped face up, if equipped Creature is engaged with a Creature with Fire, equipped Creature gains 10 Energy.
Equipped Creature has "Fireproof 10."

name: Illazar
effect: When a Creature you control leaves play, if that Creature had one or more Mugic counters on it, remove a Mugic counter from target Creature.
Unique
No one believed Bodal when he said he was struck by a streaking rainbow.

name: Illexia, The Danian Queen
effect: Your adjacent Creatures have "Defender."
When a Mandiblor or an Infected Creature is put into a discard pile, Illexia gains a Mugic counter.
1MC: Activate Hive.
Hive: Mugic counters on Illexia count as Mandiblors you control when counting Mandiblors.
Unique, Loyal

name: Infectious Melody
effect: Infect up to two target Uninfected Creatures.
A tune so chilling that it makes your skin crawl.

name: Infight
effect: If opposing engaged Creature is Danian, Activate Hive. Hive may not be Deactivated.

name: Jaal
effect: When Jaal deals Earth damage to an Uninfected Creature, Infect that Creature.
While engaged with an Infected Creature, Jaal has "Earth 5."

name: Kamangareth
effect: Deal 15 damage to Kamangareth while engaged: Deactivate Hive.
"Stalk, isolate, destroy. Do these three things and the Danians are powerless!"

name: Kelvedran
effect: Fireproof 10 (When this Creature becomes engaged with a Creature with Fire, it gains 10 Energy.)
Earthproof 10 (When this Creature becomes engaged with a Creature with Earth, it gains 10 Energy.)

name: Khavakk
effect: 1MC: Deal 5 damage to target Creature.
1MC, Deactivate Hive: Deal 15 damage to target Creature. (Hive must be active to deactivate it.)
"Power, strength and stamina? Overrated."

name: Khritlaan
effect: While Khritlaan is in your discard pile, Mandiblor cards in your discard pile count as Mandiblors you control when counting Mandiblors.
"Even from the grave shall you serve Illexia."

name: Kolmo
effect: Invisibility: Disarm
While engaged with a Danian Noble, Kolmo has "Invisibility: Strike 20."
Range
Swift 1
Unique

name: Lomma
effect: Defender
Water 5
The first attack against Lomma each combat deals 10 less damage.
After losing her family as a child, Lomma vowed that no one would terrorize her tribe again.

name: Mahrrant
effect: When an Infected Creature is put into a discard pile, Mahrrant gains a Mugic counter.
1MC: Activate Hive.
Never let anything go to waste - including your fallen foes.

name: Malevolent Blast
effect: Air: Your engaged Creature loses Air. Discard an Attack Card, then draw an Attack Card.

name: Mandiblor Crown
effect: Equipped Creature has Creature Type Mandiblor in addition to its other types.
Equipped Creature has "Hive: This creature has an additional 5 Energy."

name: Mandiblor Might
effect: Deal 5 damage for each Mandiblor you control adjacent to your engaged Creature.

name: Melodic Might
effect: Draw two Attack Cards, then discard two Attack Cards.
When Plan A fails, switch to Plan B.

name: Melody of the Meek
effect: If target Creature with 30 or less Scanned Energy would take greater than 10 damage from a single source, it takes 10 damage instead.

name: Momental Virtuosity
effect: Target Creature gains 50 in the discipline of your choice.
Target Creature gains 50 in another discipline of your choice.  (You may target the same Creature.)

name: Mount Pillar Reservoir
effect: Creatures have "Fireproof 10."
Danian Creatures have "Water 5."
All Danians know that the Reservoir is the well-spring of life. It must be defended to the death.

name: Muge's Edge
effect: Your engaged Creature gains 10 Courage, Power, Wisdom and Speed.
If your engaged Creature is a Muge, deal 10 damage.

name: Mugician Steal
effect: Water: Your engaged Creature loses Water. Remove a Mugic counter from the opposing engaged Creature. If you do, put a Mugic counter on your engaged Creature.

name: Munnari
effect: Invisibility: Disarm (When this Creature becomes engaged, the opposing engaged Creature's Battlegear loses all abilities.)
As Tangath Toborn reached for his blade, his heart sank when he realized he only had his sheath at his side.

name: Narfall
effect: When Narfall becomes engaged, deal 5 damage to opposing engaged Creature for each Elemental Type that Creature has.
The breeze suddenly died, as if all hope left the world.

name: Oipont's Lookout
effect: Creatures with Air have Earth.
While Hive is Active, Danians have Air and Earth.
From high above, Danians can see deep into the heart of the UnderWorld, including invading armies days in advance.

name: Ornathor
effect: Waterproof 10 (When this Creature becomes engaged with a Creature with Water, it gains 10 Energy.)

name: Overworld Embassy at Mount Pillar
effect: When Overworld Embassy at Mount Pillar becomes the active Location, Uninfect all Creatures.
Though adorned with oah and jij plants from his village, one look outside his window reminds Raznus that he's far from home.

name: Parasite Token
effect: Infected

name: Parasite Token 2
effect: Infected

name: Pillar Quake
effect: If opposing engaged Creature is Danian, damage dealt by Pillar Quake is reduced to 0.

name: Prelude of Protection
effect: Target Creature gains "Fireproof 10", "Airproof 10", "Earthproof 10", and "Waterproof 10".
Perhaps the Cothica is in the light, the land, the very winds that blow!

name: Purge Dirge
effect: Deal 5 damage to target Creature for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play, then Uninfect all Creatures.
Unique
This may sting a little. But usually, a lot.

name: Queen's Gate
effect: At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with Scouts lose and cannot gain Invisibility.
"Did you hear something moving? Did you see something moving? I think I just touched something moving..."

name: Ramarhvir, the Danian Hivebringer
effect: When Hive is activated, you may move a Mugic counter from a Danian you control to Ramarhvir, the Danian Hivebringer.
2MC: Return target Mandiblor card in your discard pile to play in an open space.

name: Raznus, Ambassador to the Danians
effect: Danian Creatures you control may play OverWorld Mugic.
Fireproof 10
Unique
Raznus yearned to forge an alliance. The Danians had other ideas.

name: Recurring Rescue
effect: Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
If the target of Recurring Rescue has 30 or less Scanned Energy, return Recurring Rescue to your hand when it resolves.
Ahh... a song so soothing that OverWorlders yearn to hear it again and again.

name: Reverberate
effect: If an Attack Card named Reverberate is in your Attack Discard pile, deal 10 damage.

name: Ribbian
effect: Invisibility: Disarm
Air 5
When a Creature deals damage to itself, that damage is increased by 5.
Ribbian quickly learned that it's much easier to give orders than to take them.

name: Sands of the Unseen
effect: Creatures with Air have "Invisibility: Strike 10."
Danians seek the answers to Mipedian invisibility, but they realize too late that some secrets should remain mysteries.

name: Scout's Monocular
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy and 15 Wisdom.
If equipped Creature is a Scout, it has "1MC: Turn target face‐down Battlegear face‐up."

name: Scout's Strike
effect: Stat Check Speed 50: Deal 10 damage.
If your engaged Creature is a Scout, look at opposing player's Attack and Mugic hands.

name: Serenade of Subordinance
effect: Target Creature loses 50 in the discipline of your choice.
Target Creature gains 50 in another discipline of your choice. (You may target the same Creature.)

name: Sha-Kree Flats
effect: At the beginning of combat, engaged Elementalists gain an Elemental type of their controller's choice.
Flat, dry, inhospitable. Perfect!

name: Slufurah
effect: Muges have "Sacrifice this Creature: Deal 10 damage to target Creature."
"You've run out of Mugicians? Do not fear. I know how you can still be useful."

name: Song of Encompassing
effect: Creatures you control gain the Creature Type Mandiblor in addition to their other types.
All I heard was the buzzing... the deafening, maddening buzzing!

name: Song of Resilience
effect: If target Creature has Fire, it gains "Fireproof 10"; if it has Air, it gains "Airproof 10"; if it has Earth, it gains "Earthproof 10"; if it has Water, it gains "Waterproof 10".

name: Song of Shelter
effect: Target Creature you control may not be the target of Mugic or abilities.
How seven little notes can create such diverse wonders is one of the great, unsolvable mysteries of Perim.

name: Stingblade Prototype
effect: When Hive is activated, the next time an Attack would deal damage this turn, it deals 10 damage  instead.
Unique

name: Strike of the Meek
effect: If your engaged Creature has 30 or less Scanned Energy, deal 50 damage.

name: Strikto
effect: When Strikto gains a Mugic counter, it loses 10 Energy.
When a Creature deals damage to Strikto, that Creature loses 5 Energy.

name: Sunder Ground
effect: Earth: Your engaged Creature loses Earth.

name: Supercharged Alterant
effect: When Supercharged Alterant is flipped face up, choose a discipline. Equipped Creature gains 100 in the chosen discipline.

name: Swassa
effect: Deal 10 damage to a Creature you control: That Creature gains "Swift 2". This ability can only be used once per turn.
Rule #31: Never disobey a leader who wields four weapons at once.

name: Switch Riff
effect: Target unengaged Mipedian Creature you control swaps spaces with another target unengaged Mipedian Creature you control.
Beware if you see two sets of footprints... but only one Mipedian.

name: Sword of Khy'at
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy and 15 Speed.
If equipped Creature is a Warrior, it has "When this Creature deals 20 or more attack damage, deal 5 damage to target Creature."

name: Tassanil
effect: Water 5
Hive: Tassanil has an additional 5 Energy for each Elemental Type opposing Creatures have.
Tassanil counts as a Mandiblor.
Unique

name: Telebracers
effect: When Telebracers is flipped face-up, the top card of your Location Deck becomes the active Location.

name: Terraport
effect: Earth: Your engaged Creature loses Earth. Look at the top two cards of your Location Deck and choose one. It becomes the active Location.

name: The Barracks
effect: At the end of combat, if a Warrior you control was engaged this turn, you may relocate that Creature into an unoccupied space adjacent to it.
Rest well tonight. Another harsh day awaits.

name: The Darkened Dunes
effect: Creatures with Earth have "Range" and "Swift 1."
The dark whirlwind descends, enveloping you in its black, velvet grip... and never lets go.

name: Ultadur
effect: Commanders you control have Fire and "Recklessness 5."
Ultadur may not gain Mugic counters.
And in an instant, the village was gone, the land was scorched and the fields would never flower again.

name: Ur-Shard
effect: Equipped Creature has "Earth 5" and "Recklessness 5."
If equipped Creature is destroyed while engaged, destroy any Battlegear equipped to opposing engaged Creature and equip Ur‐Shard to opposing engaged Creature.

name: Yondaf
effect: When an opposing Uninfected Creature is targeted by a Mugic you control, Infect that Creature.
Forget your Tribe, forget your friends, forget yourself. You are one of us now!
